email_chain.subject: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Dear Sophia,

We are looking to transport 12,500MT of steel coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai on CIF terms. Could you provide a suitable vessel and a freight quote? We require a laycan of October 10-15.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Thank you for your inquiry. I can offer the vessel OCEAN HARMONY, DWT 150,000, LOA 280m, for a freight rate of USD 85 per MT. Laycan is October 10-15 as requested. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Thanks for the quick response. USD 85 per MT seems a bit high given the current market. Could you consider USD 78 per MT? Also, can you confirm the demurrage rate and loading window?

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Given the current market conditions, I can offer a revised rate of USD 80 per MT. The demurrage rate is USD 14,000 per day, pro rata, and the loading window is 72 hours. Let me know if this works for you.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Inquiry: Vessel for Steel Coils from Rotterdam to Shanghai
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

USD 80 per MT is acceptable. Can we lock in the OCEAN HARMONY with a laycan of October 10-15? Please send over the charter party for review.

Best regards,
Liam Carter

email_chain.subject: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Liam,

Great, I'll proceed with the booking. Attached is the charter party for your review. Let me know if you need any adjustments.

Best regards,
Sophia Martinez

email_chain.subject: Re: Fwd: Charter Party for OCEAN HARMONY
email_chain.body:
Hi Sophia,

Charter party looks good. We'll proceed as discussed. Thanks for your help!

Best regards,
Liam Carter
